};
export const LANGUAGES = {
  HEBREW: 'he',
  ENGLISH: 'en',
  GREEK: 'el'
};

// Polling fallback interval (ms)
export const POLL_INTERVAL = 5000;

// SSE reconnect delay (ms)
export const SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY = 3000;
export default {
  translations,
  API_BASE_URL,
  SSE_STREAM_URL,
  AI_ASSISTANT_URL,
  ROLES,
  LANGUAGES,
  POLL_INTERVAL,
  SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY
};

sourcesContent:
// Constants and translations for the hotel dashboard

export const translations = {
  he: {
    title: "ניהול LuxuryStay AI",
    summary: "דו\"ח סיכום",
    online: "מערכת מקוונת",
    owner: "מנהל",
    staff: "צוות עובדים",
    guest: "אורח",
    exit: "יציאה",
    towels: "מגבות",
    rest: "מסעדה",
    logTitle: "יומן פעולות AI",
    saved: "נשמר בזיכרון",
    changeRole: "החלף תפקיד",
    aiAssistant: "עוזר AI",
    welcome: "ברוכים הבאים",
    howCanWeHelp: "במה נוכל לעזור?",
    openTask: "משימה פתוחה",
    markDone: "סמן כבוצע",
    close: "סגור",
    actionsCompleted: "פעולות הושלמו היום",
    room: "חדר",
    suite: "סוויטה",
  },
  en: {
    title: "LuxuryStay AI Management",
    summary: "Summary Report",
    online: "System Online",
    owner: "Owner",
    staff: "Staff",
    guest: "Guest",
    exit: "Checkout",
    towels: "Towels",
    rest: "Restaurant",
    logTitle: "AI Activity Log",
    saved: "Saved to Memory",
    changeRole: "Switch Role",
    aiAssistant: "AI Assistant",
    welcome: "Welcome",
    howCanWeHelp: "How can we help?",
    openTask: "Open Task",
    markDone: "Mark Done",
    close: "Close",
    actionsCompleted: "Actions Completed Today",
    room: "Room",
    suite: "Suite",
  },
  el: {
    title: "Διαχείριση LuxuryStay AI",
    summary: "Αναφορά",
    online: "Σύστημα Online",
    owner: "Ιδιοκτήτης",
    staff: "Προσωπικό",
    guest: "Επισκέπτης",
    exit: "Αποχώρηση",
    towels: "Πετσέτες",
    rest: "Εστιατόριο",
    logTitle: "Αρχείο AI",
    saved: "Αποθηκεύτηκε",
    changeRole: "Αλλαγή Ρόλου",
    aiAssistant: "Βοηθός AI",
    welcome: "Καλώς ήρθατε",
    howCanWeHelp: "Πώς μπορούμε να βοηθήσουμε;",
    openTask: "Ανοιχτή Εργασία",
    markDone: "Σημείωση ως Ολοκληρωμένο",
    close: "Κλείσιμο",
    actionsCompleted: "Ενέργειες Ολοκληρώθηκαν Σήμερα",
    room: "Δωμάτιο",
    suite: "Σουίτα",
  },
};

// API Base URL
// - In development: uses localhost:5000
// - In production: set REACT_APP_API_URL in Netlify environment variables
export const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL || 'http://127.0.0.1:5000';

// SSE Stream URL (same base, different endpoint)
export const SSE_STREAM_URL = `${API_BASE_URL}/api/stream/bookings`;

// Frontend URLs
export const AI_ASSISTANT_URL = 'https://voluble-beignet-896a35.netlify.app/';

export const ROLES = {
  OWNER: 'owner',
  STAFF: 'staff',
  GUEST: 'guest',
};

export const LANGUAGES = {
  HEBREW: 'he',
  ENGLISH: 'en',
  GREEK: 'el',
};

// Polling fallback interval (ms)
export const POLL_INTERVAL = 5000;

// SSE reconnect delay (ms)
export const SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY = 3000;

export default {
  translations,
  API_BASE_URL,
  SSE_STREAM_URL,
  AI_ASSISTANT_URL,
  ROLES,
  LANGUAGES,
  POLL_INTERVAL,
  SSE_RECONNECT_DELAY,
};
